articles.description: If you have been waiting to purchase a premium smartphone, then this may be the opportune time to do so. Smartphone makers like Samsung,OnePlus and others have slashed the prices of their high-end smartphones. Here are 8 premium smartphones that have received…
articles.content: OnePlus 8 Pro was launched in India in April last year in India. The smartphone comes in two variants -- 8GB RAM and 12GB RAM priced at Rs 54,999 and Rs 59,999 respectively. However, after the price … [+233 chars]
